_meta.description: Curated comp benchmarks by vertical. Refresh when >90 days old using sec_filings.py.

comps.notes: Franchise-heavy (~98% franchised). Revenue includes royalties, ad fees, company-owned sales.

benchmark_ranges._note: Based on WING only until JACK is refreshed. Widen ranges once multiple comps available.

operating_margin_pct.source: WING FY2024 (26.5%); lower end reflects company-owned-heavy models

turnover_rate.source: QSR industry estimates (BLS, NRA); rarely disclosed in filings

ebitda_margin_pct.source: Operating margin proxy; add D&A (~2-4% of revenue) for true EBITDA

employees_per_location.source: Industry estimates; varies heavily by format (counter vs. full-service)

benchmark_ranges._note: No comps cached yet. Run sec_filings.py for SHAK (Shake Shack) or DPZ (Dominos).
No standard comp set for manufacturing yet. Use industry reports for benchmarks.

gross_margin_pct.source: Broad manufacturing range; varies heavily by sub-sector

ebitda_margin_pct.source: Industry estimates; food manufacturing skews lower, specialty higher
